name: SpaceDweller
description:
SpaceDweller is a turn based game where you have to fight against the Empire that attacked your sector. Travel from on star system to another, upgrade your ship and destroy your enemies. Combine modules and satellites with unique abilities to gain advantage in battle.

Features:
  • Procedurally generated enemies and levels
  • Your enemies have unique abilities that require special approach for each of them
  • Summon satellites that will fight on your side.
  • Try different combinations of modules and satellites
  • Enjoyable music
  • Permadeath
